thread.title: Tucker Carlson Asks Planned Parenthood Exec ‘What Is Being Aborted,’ Response Is Blowing Minds…
thread.title_full: Tucker Carlson Asks Planned Parenthood Exec ‘What Is Being Aborted,’ Response Is Blowing Minds…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Tucker Carlson Asks Planned Parenthood Exec ‘What Is Being Aborted,’ Response Is Blowing Minds…
text:
05:20pm March 14, 2017 Do you like this article? 
Tucker Carlson was at it again last night delivering a must see interview with a delusional leftist. 
He sat down with the EVP of Planned Parenthood and tried to get her to answer an incredibly simple question. 
What is being aborted? 
As expected, she came up with nothing. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1464204305408-0'); }); 
Well, not nothing. She did manage to provide a viral example of liberal ignorance.   
Another masterful interview by Tucker. 
The only thing I wish Tucker had mentioned was that there are thousands of health centers across the country who can provide all the services PP does minus abortion. All you have to do is strip PP of the money and reallocate it to the health centers and the problem is solved. PP can go ahead providing abortions all they want by raising money from the private sector like every other non-profit does. 
Other than that, Tucker wiped the floor with her. 
You ever notice how liberals just repeat the same talking point over and over without answering the question?   
The reality of the situation is that this woman knows stopping a heartbeat is wrong.   
She just can’t bring herself to admit it.  3'); }); 
This interview really tells you everything you need to know about Planned Parenthood. 
Props to Tucker. Without a doubt the best show on cable news.
